properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Dyer, TN; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 29 at 12:35PM CST until February 2 at 3:33PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Mississippi River...

Mississippi River at Caruthersville affecting Mississippi...
Pemiscot...Dyer...Lake and Lauderdale Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Mississippi River at Caruthersville
* from Wednesday January 29 until Sunday February 02.
* At 12 PM Wednesday the stage was 31.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 32 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall through the end
of the week. Levels are expected to fall below 29 feet on
Sunday.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Thursday morning or sooner
if conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
